title: Stock Market ETL
desc: Poll historical stock data via Alpha Vantage API and perform a simple ETL job with Pandas, AstraDB, and AWS S3.

title: Data Generator

title: Pathfinder
desc: A visualization of popular pathfinding algorithms traversing randomly generated mazes, highlighting cells visited and the optimal path to reach the end.

title: Sort Visualizer

title: Portfolio
